name: Dodge Nurse
description:
Dodge Nurse

You are a brave nurse who is trying to help her fellow allies Fallen soldiers so they can get back to Action.

W A S D to move around

E to interact with the soldiers

Pick up items 

Holes that are created from explosions are the only safe place from the enemy fire

A small game made for a gamejam with the theme "Holes"

Constributors

  • Arthilec (Programming)
  • Loki22 (Art)
  • nowox (Programming)
